name: unobtanium-nodejs-scraper
description: Simple NodeJs Scraper that will help the Unobtainium Community stay up-to-date with the latest stock information for products.

scripts.start:process: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && npx pm2 save && npm run warn:process:stop
scripts.stop:process: npx pm2 stop unobtainium-nodejs-scraper && npx pm2 delete unobtainium-nodejs-scraper && npx pm2 save && npm run warn:process:start
scripts.warn:process:stop: echo 'To stop the process at any time run, npm run stop:process'
scripts.warn:process:start: echo 'To start the process at any time run, npm run start:process'

author: Buddy C Delaune
